verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Bwana tunakushukuru Bwana tunakushukuru asante sana Bwana asante sana*2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1.Umetulisha mkate na kutunywesha Bwana tunakushukuru asante sana Bwana asante sana*2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 2.Umetulinda mtulinda mchana pia usiku, Bwana tunakushukuru asante sana Bwana asante sana*2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 3.Umetuepusha ajili tutembeapo Bwana tunakushukuru asante sana Bwana asante sana*2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 4.Umetutia nguvu pia uhai Bwana tunakushukuru asante sana Bwana asante sana*2
